articles.description: England's 1-1 draw against Hungary on Tuesday night provided more questions than answers for Gareth Southgate. Sportsmail examines some of the issues he faces.
articles.content:
England's 1-1 draw against Hungary on Tuesday night provided more questions than answers for Gareth Southgate.

articles.author: Libby Purves, Tanith Carey
articles.title: Can you ever really forgive a cheater? As Coleen Rooney says she has moved on - Daily Mail
articles.description: Coleen Rooney has decided to move on from her husband Wayne's infidelity. Libby Purves and Tanith Carey debate if you can ever really forgive infidelity.
articles.content:
YES
By Libby Purves
Thankfully, I have never had to forgive a cheater. At least not in marriage. But from friends and from instinct, I think some cheating can be forgiven, as Coleen has decided to … [+5178 chars]
